text:
Hello! New cms developer here. Another team member already created a page and I am trying to `watch` locally. I cloned his repo from github so the question is:
*How can I connect my local repo to HubSpot cms?*
Did you run `hs init` first to connect?

This is a good “Getting started” article: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-local-development|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-local-development>

Thanks, let me see that other "gettin started" article. I only found the one where you are the creator of the first page, but this article seems the one I could be looking for to connect to an existing page
